componentDescription: Displays an interactive list where users can reorder items by dragging and dropping them.

items.description: An array of items to be displayed and managed by the drag-and-drop component.

onChange.description: Optional callback function invoked when the order of items changes after a drag-and-drop operation.

renderItem.description: Optional render prop for custom item rendering, potentially overriding the one from DragAndDropProps for the view component.

containerProps.description: Optional props to be applied to the main container element of the drag-and-drop component.

itemProps.description: Optional props to be applied to each individual draggable item element.

draggedIndex.description: The index of the item currently being dragged, or null if no item is being dragged.

itemRefs.description: A mutable ref object holding references to the DOM elements of each draggable item.

handleDragStart.description: Function to handle the start of a drag operation, taking the event and the item's index as parameters.

views.description: Optional property to pass specific props to various sub-components (container, item) within the view.

views.container.description: Optional props specifically for the container view component.

views.item.description: Optional props specifically for each individual item view component.
